original_text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father. There is one who accuses you: Moses, on whom you have set your hope.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 아버지께 고발할까 생각하지 말라 너희를 고발하는 이가 있으니 곧 너희가 바라는 자 모세니라

sentences.original_text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 아버지께 고발할 것이라고 생각하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: There is one who accuses you
on whom you have set your hope.
